metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11733 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability was found in the function stackswap (called from decompileSTACKSWAP) in util/decompile.c in Ming 0.4.8, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
